title: After update to 91.0.2 on Win 10 Pro only a bookmark folder for shopping is available - profile is OK
content:
Prior to update this morning I had a top with about 50 items and a folder just for car shopping which has lots of items. Updated to 91.0.2 and now only the shopping URLs are shown. Manage gets me nothing. The folder C:\Users\Xxxx\AppData\Roaming\Mozilla\Firefox\Profiles\6dbbz7gb.default-release\bookmarkbackups most recent item is 4 months ago but an extract errors out.

Is it possible to get back to my old bookmarks? If so, how?
creator: johngammel

title: Firefox causes 100% CPU usage when opening couple tabs at the same time!!!
content:
I Am on desktop:

i5 9600KF (high performance mode) 16GB 3200mhz ram NVME... Windows 10 Pro x64 Firefox last stable

When I open Firefox tabs aren't loaded all at the same time, but they are suspended. So after that: when I switch between 6 tabs quickly - they start to open at the same time. And CPU usage skyrockets to 100% LOL! Given I Am on high end PC - this is joke! I was using chrome and had hundreds of tabs and Chrome doesn't even suspend them by default. They open all at the same time I think!

So there is something wrong! I tried troubleshooting mode and it was the same problem!

Thanks for help!
creator: empleat

title: Firefox opens, but will not open websites. Cannot open settings. Cannot log in.
content:
Firefox 91.0.2 worked fine for several months.

Now it will open but when I enter a URL, it remains a blank white screen.

When I click on "Settings" it also remains a blank white screen.

When I click on "Sign In" it remains a blank white screen.

I have uninstalled and reinstalled. I have deleted my profile folder.

I like Firefox and would like to continue using it but it is currently not usable and I can't figure out how to make it usable again.
creator: jsmorris1

title: Why does sync not maintain and populate my bookmark folder structure?
content:
I've just set up a new laptop and tried to sync all my bookmarks' (rather complex) sub-folder structure to the new machine, but sync strips out all the bookmarks and simply lumps them together above the then empty list of sub-folders. With several hundred specific bookmarks and several dozen folders in the structure, this creates a nightmare to sort out.

Have I missed a trick here perhaps, or is that the norm?

Thanks
creator: rjhfandclf

title: Shopee Chat Issues
content:
Hi. Previously when using Shopee webchat (https://seller.shopee.com.my/webchat/conversations), I can send messages just by clicking Enter. But now, when I click Enter it makes a new line instead, as if I was pressing Shift+Enter. Also, I cannot send images by pasting them (Ctrl C+Cltr V) into the chat anymore. I need to send the image as an attachment instead.

This also happens in Lazada webchat (https://sellercenter.lazada.com.my/apps/im/window). It happens in Lazada webchat first few weeks/months (I can't remember) ago, then it happened in Shopee webchat as well.

I hope someone can help me on this. Thank you very much!

title: Desinstalador de Firefox saspechoso
content:
Hola buenos días,

El otro dia encontré en la carpeta C:\Windows un archivo llamado "FirefoxUnistaller.exe", el cual no tiene signatura verificada. Ningún antivirus me lo detecta como un virus pero la ruta del archivo es muy sospechosa, entonces no se que hacer. Si lo borro quizá si algún dia lo necesito no puedo desinstalar Firefox pero si es un virus lo tengo que borrar.

Me he fijado que la aplicación se inicia con el sistema. Es normal?

Que hago?

Gracias
creator: vidalnuneza

title: Websites with embedded content from third-party websites not working, even when enhanced tracking protection is disabled.
content:
Hi I have been having a few problems getting some websites to work properly in Firefox, even when I disable all my extensions (uBlock Origin, DeCentraleyes, HTTPS Everywhere) and also disable enhanced tracking protection.

It has happened with a few websites, but I investigated one yesterday. It failed to load video on Firefox, but had no problem loading it on Edge. The video content was hosted on a site named Wistia.com (which loads just fine by itself).

What settings should I change in Firefox to enable this type of content to work?

title: Malfunction when I press the letter 'a' on keyboard on Lenovo IdeaPad C340 on Windows 10 in Firefox
content: I have this weird problem with my Firefox browser on my Windows 10 PC. It doesn't happen in Chrome or Edge browsers. Not always, but a quiet a few times when I press the letter 'a' on my keyboard when I'm filling out a field in a form or something, it automatically presses enter!? So if I'm typing my email address in a field for example, mr@doma.... the forms takes me to another field or sometimes acts like enter was pressed. The 'a' button is no where near the TAB or ENTER button and I'm not accidentally pressing them. It's driving me crazy and I hope someone can help me fix it as the way this is going, I might have to stop using Firefox which is Not what I want! I have looked online for help but it's hard to find anything like this as I can't even describe the problem?! I went to my google home page, typed this 'firefox presses enter when I type a' to get some help online, but as soon as I typed the last letter 'a', it loaded a page which had nothing to do with what I wrote. Sometimes refreshing the page works than it occurs randomly. I just tried to replicate it but no go.
creator: aus-sam

title: 91.0.1 sürümünden itibaren sorunlar var
content:
Merhabalar,

91.0.1 sürümünden itibaren ciddi sorunlar var. Örneğin herhangi bir indirme başlatılıyor ama sonlandırılamıyor.

Aşağıdaki gibi web sitelerine girdiğinizde resimlerin bulunmadığı sadece linklerin yeraldığı html görüntüsüyle karşılaşılıyor (diğer tarayıcılarda aynı sayfalar açılıyor) https://www.haber7.com/ https://www.milliyet.com.tr/

bazılarında ise sertifika sorunu ekranı ile karşılaşılıyor. Bir de güvenlik sorunu yaşananlar var. https://www.star.com.tr/

Yukarıdaki sorunu kayıtlı yerimlerimin çoğunda yaşıyorum. Bizi Chrome a mahkum etmeyeceğinizi ümit ediyorum.
creator: m_okay

title: I HATE the changes to search facility !
content:
Forever you've been apply to type anything into the Google search bar on the home screen, but not anymore.

Now whateveryou type automatically appear up in the tab line with https// infront of it , then of course it comes back with ...cannot find that web address !!

I'm not looking for a web address, i'm searching a subject matter..

This change is SO annoying I'm now seriously thinking of dumping my much loved Firefox for something which works better.

Why isn't there the 'option' to do search without it 'assuming' you're looking for a web address ?


So Annoying and frustrating, whoever dreamt this idea up....?
creator: jacksonp

title: Restore previous email layout
content: Firefox just updated. I went to check my email and the layout was totally different and all the messages that were in my inbox and junk folder were gone!!! As a matter of fact, ALL of my saved emails and folders are gone!!! Where did they go? How do I get them back? How do I restore the previous Outlook view? It seems as if every time I get used to a layout you change it. This is a crock!!! I save things, such as emails that are important, and I place them in folders that I have created, so I know where they are and you guys just change it and throw away my folders? How do I go back to the previous version of Firefox? Or, how do I go back to the previous version of outlook so I can get my folders, saved emails, as well as my inbox back? If you are going to do this type of thing then give us the option of retaining our emails and the look and feel that we are used to. Some of us have trouble remembering things and change is difficult!!!!
creator: kjayhouse15
